channel.title: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
channel.description:
[Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Tor_Browser_Downloader_by_Whonix) will currently show.
> ERROR: > Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters) Either check.torproject.org has been compromised or this is a Whonix bug. > Possible reasons: > > - The download server is down. > - File size exceeded (endless data attack triggered). > - Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix developers) has been broken due to upstream changes. > Recommendations: > > - Try again later. If the error persists it probably won't solve itself before the next update. > - Check News: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stay_Tuned > - Manually update: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Updating_Tor_Browser
This is a known bug. [No indicator for a security concern](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Compromise_Indicators). It has already been reported to Tor Project:
> [Broken redirect on https://www.torproject.org/projects/torbrowser/RecommendedTBBVersions](https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/29936)
Meanwhile please refer to:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Updating_Tor_Browser

item.title: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi HapticBovine

HapticBovine:

Where does one normally apply instructions such as these?

If you are referring to manual Tor Browser download this is done in the AppVM.

HapticBovine:

Sorry I just noticed this is a Whonix forum, not Qubes OS… derp

No worries you are in the right place since this bug affects all platforms i.e. Qubes-Whonix, Non-Qubes-Whonix. There is also a Qubes-Whonix forum if you want to take a look:

https://forums.whonix.org/c/qubes-whonix

What to post in Qubes-Whonix forum:

https://forums.whonix.org/t/what-to-post-in-this-qubes-whonix-forum-and-what-not/2275

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
item.dc:creator: HapticBovine
item.description:
Please forgive my ignorance, but I’m not sure where to perform these instructions.

For example, I applied Patrick’s advice–which seemed to work–in the whonix ws template vm, but then running the anon-whonix torbrowser browser, I found even after a restart that it kept dying on this error.

Where does one normally apply instructions such as these? (My first thought was “in the template vm,” because I thought the app vms don’t persist changes…)

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
item.dc:creator: mixalink
item.description:
This bug also arises when updating qubes-whonix workstation template, after installing the latest point release to fix the recent apt vulnerability. An older tor version is supplied by qubesctl, so I updated tor using the internal updater.

Read full topic
item.source: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)

item.title: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Advanced users meanwhile could look up the version number here: https://2019.www.torproject.org/projects/torbrowser/RecommendedTBBVersions (or from other sources).

It’s possible to manually set the version you like to download thereby circumventing above bug.

Example stable version at time of writing:

tbb_version=8.0.8 update-torbrowser

Example stable version at time of writing:

tbb_version=8.5a10 update-torbrowser

Read full topic
item.source: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)

item.title: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix will currently show.

ERROR:
Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters) Either check.torproject.org has been compromised or this is a Whonix bug.
Possible reasons:

  • The download server is down.

  • File size exceeded (endless data attack triggered).

  • Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix developers) has been broken due to upstream changes.
    Recommendations:

  • Try again later. If the error persists it probably won’t solve itself before the next update.

  • Check News: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stay_Tuned

  • Manually update: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Updating_Tor_Browser

This is a known bug. No indicator for a security concern. It has already been reported to Tor Project:

Broken redirect on https://www.torproject.org/projects/torbrowser/RecommendedTBBVersions

Meanwhile please refer to:

Whonix

Manually Downloading Tor Browser

Manually Downloading Tor Browser. Useful in case Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix developers) is broken.

Read full topic
item.source: Tor Browser Downloader by Whonix - ERROR: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (323 characters)
